West_Jordan.Oquirrh Mountain Utah Temple: The Oquirrh Mountain Utah Temple is a temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) located in South Jordan, Utah, a suburb of Salt Lake City. South Jordan was the first city in the world to have two temples (it also has the Jordan River Temple). The temple was the fourth in the Salt Lake Valley and the 13th in the state of Utah.
